name: I Wanna Catch the Princess!
description:
I Wanna Catch the Princess! Made for Trijam #154 🎮Controls:
  • Press A/D to move left/right;
  • Press Space to jump;
  • Click left mouse button to continue dialogue.
🌟Staff Credits:
  • Coding, design: LeslieTheMagicStone from Campaigners;
  • Lord Devil's portrait: Yuuyi from Campaigners;
  • Music in the first half of the level: 羽天 from Campaigners;
  • Plot design: 语冰夏虫 from Campaigners.
💻Software Credits:
  • Engine: Unity 2020.3.10f1c1
  • Sprite editing: Aseprite v1.2.32
  • Music composing: Famitracker v0.4.6
📁Assets Credits:
  • Platformer pack from Kenney
  • Sounds from Freesound
Thanks for playing! Comments are very welcomed! XDD
